channel.title: Your solution to the red x
channel.description:
okay im sick of seeing posts such as 'omg the red x' 'need help with the red x' 'i just wanked over the red x' and so on...
LISTEN
first ov all make sure u have the right freakin java!! just go to www.java.com and click the free download! thats all u need its the latest version! u dont need JDK or JRE or any of that pilava...
secondly.. if you have the java! ----- the red x is still appearing right?? close down all internet explorer pages , or mozilla firefox pages, wait some few seconds and open a SINGLE new page. try again, this usually works and mopar will start loading.....
IF NOT..... restart your pc and try again. this should always wrk 90% of the time as a backup plan!!
IF NOT (still).... PMGZORZ ur comp is crap. also it cud be a fault with mopar so just it a couple of hours and try again. if not the next day it will definately be working!!!
I know this came across as a bit harsh but trust me its useful info!
ALSO i wud like some replies please :D much appreciated as i just took 5 mins of time riting that for u hehe . Anywayz goodluck!! :D

okay im sick of seeing posts such as ‘omg the red x’ ‘need help with the red x’ ‘i just wanked over the red x’ and so on…

first ov all make sure u have the right freakin java!! just go to www.java.com and click the free download! thats all u need its the latest version!

secondly… if you have the java! ----- the red x is still appearing right?? close down all internet explorer pages , or mozilla firefox pages, wait some few seconds and open a SINGLE new page. try again, this usually works and mopar will start loading…

restart your pc and try again. this should always wrk 90% of the time as a backup plan!!

IF NOT (still)…
